docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: When you live abroad and return to New York you discover that everyone seems very knowing and clever about the hard drug scene. Cute words like rip-off make stealing sound sexy. Chic people have learned to say horse for heroin and OD for overdose.

headline.main: Letters to the Editor; The Hard-Drug Scene: 'This Is a City Under Siege' Fuchsberg, Leff, Breitel And the Chief Judgeship National Defense: The Hidden Cost of Conscription Why Doctors Vanish From the Reservations ROBERT P. CORSON J.D.L. Message for Moscow WILLIAM R. PERL Bonacum's Blitz'

docs.abstract: Jewish Defense League acting Natl Chmn William R Perl lr, citing harassment of Israeli athletes at World Univ Games, Moscow, queries how USSR authorities can object to harassment of their emissaries in US
